name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alibaba To AliExpress Search By Image

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any product from Alibaba to Aliexpress by image or Url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alibaba To Aliexpress Search by image with an image url or image file.
Alibaba search by image allows you to search by image in AliExpress and check if a product is available in other vendors.

Also you can now easily create tables to compare Products' price, total sold Products , Seller rating...
================================================================

Thanks for using this extension. This extension helps you to search for related products on AliExpress by image. You can search by entering the URL of the image or selecting the image file.N.B:-By installing this Chrome extension you accept redirecting you to the links of the affiliate program AliExpress. 


How to use the extension:

1.Add to Chrome.
2.Copy the Api key and paste it.
3.Or registar a New Api key from register.
4.Go to Alibaba and click on left mouse button and click on Aliexpress image Search.

Features:
1.Don't Redirect to google like other extension
2.Option for seller rating
3.Lots of simillar product
4.Number of sold product from the seler

For any query related to Alibaba To Aliexpress Search by image you can reach to us via Gmail.
Thank You
